name: espn_bulk_search
description: Search multiple queries on ESPN in parallel using concurrent browser tabs. Use this instead of calling espn_search multiple times - it is faster and more efficient. Pass all queries as a single comma-separated string.

parameters.name: queries
parameters.description: Comma-separated search queries (e.g. 'LeBron James,Super Bowl,NBA playoffs')

detailSteps.code: const results = []; document.querySelectorAll('.contentItem, .search-results li, article').forEach((el, i) => { if (i < 15) { const titleEl = el.querySelector('a h2, .contentItem__title, h3 a'); const descEl = el.querySelector('p, .contentItem__subhead'); results.push({ title: titleEl?.textContent?.trim() || '', url: titleEl?.closest('a')?.href || '', description: descEl?.textContent?.trim()?.slice(0, 200) || '' }); } }); const pathParts = window.location.pathname.split('/q/'); const query = pathParts.length > 1 ? decodeURIComponent(pathParts[1]) : ''; return { query: query, result_count: results.length, results: results };
detailSteps.name: search_results
detailSteps.label: Extract results
